Olavo Luiz Pimentel de Carvalho (born 29 April 1947) is a Brazilian polemicist, philosopher, political pundit, former astrologer and journalist.
In the 1980s and 1990s, he become known for writing columns for some of Brazil's major media outlets, such as the newspaper "O Globo". In the 2000s, he began to use personal blogs and social media to convey his strongly conservative and anti-communist ideas.
In 2005, he moved to Richmond, Virginia.
